ProductDisqualification.name: ProductDisqualification
ProductDisqualification.description: Represents disqualification rules for products. The rules determine when the product doesnâ€™t qualify to be displayed to users. The rules are based on user context.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from which the disqualification rule for the product comes into effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date to which the disqualification rule for the product ceases to be in effect.

IsDisqualified.description: Indicates whether the product is disqualified based on the disqualification rules (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product disqualification record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product disqualification record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product disqualification record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the product disqualification record.

ParentProductId.description: The ID of the immediate parent product in the product bundle hierarchy.

ProductId.description: The product for which the disqualification rule is defined.

Reason.description: The reason to disqualify the product.

RootProductId.description: The ID of the root product in the product bundle hierarchy.
